snippet: The Bank of Portugal says it is postponing the sale of Novo Banco, explaining that the offers it received were too low.
abstract: Sale of Novo Banco is postponed by Bank of Portugal due to lack of market interest in purchase at current price.
lead_paragraph: The Bank of Portugal says it is postponing the sale of Novo Banco, explaining that the offers it received were too low.

headline.print_headline: Low Bids for Novo Banco Spur Bank of Portugal to Delay Sale
headline.main: Low Bids for Novo Banco Spur Bank of Portugal to Delay Sale
